1.title: Anarchy Has a Destiny
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In 2019, crime statistics are at an all-time high. Police, in an attempt to lower crime statistics, provide criminals with a space where all crime is legal within the perimeters. However, if someone should be caught committing an offense outside of the boundaries, the penalties become much harsher. Once a month, a police officer must do an inspecting on the property, to either do an inventory check, or a body count. But on rookie cop Charlie Marshal's first night on the job, he is sent into the property and ambushed by a group of squatting thugs with lethal intentions. The event causes a chain reacting affecting many individuals and changes the future of Australian crime.
imdb.title: The UnCivilised
plot: In 2019, crime statistics are at an all-time high. Police, in an attempt to lower crime statistics, provide criminals with a space where all crime is legal within the perimeters. However, if someone should be caught committing an offense outside of the boundaries, the penalties become much harsher. But on rookie cop Charlie Marshal's first night on the job, he is sent into the property and ambushed by a group of squatting thugs with lethal intentions. The event causes a chain reacting affecting many individuals and changes the future of Australian crime.::Cory Dawson
